Initial commit: Complete Phase I-IV implementation

Project: The Evolution of Todo - Mastering Spec-Driven Development & Cloud Native AI

Completed:
- Phase I: Console App \(Python CLI with 71 passing tests\)
- Phase II: Web App \(FastAPI backend + Next.js frontend\)
- Phase III: AI Chatbot \(OpenAI Agents SDK + MCP integration\)
- Phase IV: Local Kubernetes \(Helm charts ready\)

Includes:
- Comprehensive specification documents \(specify.md, plan.md, tasks.md\)
- Project constitution for governance
- Docker Compose setup for local development
- Full test suites for all phases

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
